items.item_details:
Recess to Closed Session
	(Open Session will resume at the end of Closed Session in the Lounge at approximately 12:10 p.m.)
	 
	See item 7 on agenda (Closed Session).
items.item_text: Recess to Closed Session (Open Session will resume at the end of Closed Session in the Lounge at approximately 12:10 p.m.) See item 7 on agenda (Closed Session).
items.item_text_raw: 1.03 Recess to Closed Session (Open Session will resume at the end of Closed Session in the Lounge at approximately 12:10 p.m.) See item 7 on agenda (Closed Session).

items.item_details:
I pledge allegiance
to the flag of the
United States of America
and to the Republic
for which it stands
one nation under God
indivisible with liberty
and justice for all.
Information explaining Board meeting procedures and how citizens can address the Board will be read. Written information is located near the entrance to the Lounge.
